titles.title: VET Act of 2015

A bill to require the Administrator of the Small Business Administration to carry out a pilot program on issuing grants to eligible veterans to start or acquire qualifying businesses, and for other purposes.
VET Act of 2015
Veterans Entrepreneurial Transition Act of 2015

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary:
Veterans Entrepreneurial Transition Act of 2015 or the VET Act of 2015
This bill directs the Small Business Administration to carry out a pilot program to assess the feasibility and advisability of making grants to eligible veterans to start or acquire a qualifying business enterprise.
